policy.name: Policy for service #51937285, Convert HTTP Form to MIME
policy.xml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy"> <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required"> <L7p:HttpFormPost> <L7p:FieldInfos fieldInfoArray="included"> <L7p:item fieldInfo="included"> <L7p:ContentType stringValue="text/xml; charset="utf-8""/> <L7p:Fieldname stringValue="xmlchunk"/> </L7p:item> </L7p:FieldInfos> </L7p:HttpFormPost> <L7p:EchoRoutingAssertion/> </wsp:All> </wsp:Policy>
